unit: Unit 8 | Inference for Categorical Data: Chi-Square
title: Dog Size and Adoption Rates: Is There Evidence?
question_text:
Are small, medium, and large sized dogs adopted from animal shelters at the same rate? Rebecca surveyed several rescue organizations about recent dog adoptions and was able to gather the data displayed below.
Assuming the necessary conditions are satisfied, what is the $p$-value of the appropriate test?
